description: For full flavour, you've got to try this punchy pilaf. Made with brown rice, lean beef mince and green beans, it'll quickly become a family favourite.
keywords: Dinner,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Green beans,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Mince,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Healthier Spiced Beef & Green Bean Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths Heart Smart extra lean beef mince
1 cup medium-grain brown rice, rinsed, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Cook mince, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 8 minutes or until browned. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until softened.

Add paprika, cumin and currants, then cook for 2 minutes, stirring, or until fragrant. Add tomatoes and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes or until thickened.

Add rice and 3 cups water and bring to the boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, covered, for 50 minutes, adding beans to pan in the last 5 minutes or cooking, or until rice is tender and liquid has been absorbed. Season with pepper.
Divide rice mixture among plates. Serve topped with pine nuts and mint leaves.
